title: A Win-Win Relationship!
detail_text: <:th_ch0106/>This is the first time I went here, but it’s really delicious, huh. The fried horse mackerel was really juicy!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Hehe, isn’t it~? I just happened to find this place while I was out with You-chan, it’s delicious and cheap!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>You sure showed me a good place to eat~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Plus.... they also include desserts during this time of the year!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Desserts too!? Isn’t this place just the best!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Right~? It’s big, round, and shiny mikan!! The owner lady will bring it to us~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Ah, so it’s a mikan, huh....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>So then, Yoshiko-chan~. Would you trade the mikan dessert with my karaage? Please!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>....Chika. Is that why you brought me here for....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Ehehe~. Because I want to eat two mikans, so!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
